Class LevelSceneInitialization

java.lang.Object
Level.LevelSceneInitialization
public class LevelSceneInitialization extends Object
Handles the initialization of the game scene, including setting up the background image and game timeline. - Sets the background image using a specified file path. - Initializes the game timeline for updates at a specified interval. - Starts the game by playing the timeline. Source Code: GitHub Link

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelSceneInitialization

      public LevelSceneInitialization(String backgroundImageName, double screenHeight, double screenWidth, int playerInitialHealth, javafx.scene.Group root)
      Constructs a new `LevelSceneInitialization` instance.
      Parameters:
      backgroundImageName - The file path of the background image.
      screenHeight - The height of the screen.
      screenWidth - The width of the screen.
      playerInitialHealth - The initial health of the player.
      root - The root group of the scene.

  • Method Details

    • initializeBackground

      public void initializeBackground()
      Initializes the background image for the game scene.

    • StartGame

      public void StartGame(javafx.animation.Timeline timeline)
      Starts the game by focusing on the root group and playing the timeline.
      Parameters:
      timeline - The timeline that controls the game's updates.

    • InitializeTimeline

      public void InitializeTimeline(Runnable updateScene, int MILLISECOND_DELAY, javafx.animation.Timeline timeline)
      Initializes the game timeline with a specified update interval.
      Parameters:
      updateScene - The runnable to update the game scene.
      MILLISECOND_DELAY - The interval (in milliseconds) between each update.
      timeline - The timeline to which the key frames will be added.
